messages.speaker: Alex
messages.text: yo what's up fam! ready to get wild this weekend? 🎉

messages.speaker: Jordan
messages.text: bruh moment... i gotta study 📚

messages.speaker: Alex
messages.text: studying on a weekend? what are you, a grandpa? 👴

messages.speaker: Jordan
messages.text: least i'll have a brain cell left unlike some people i know 😂

messages.speaker: Sam
messages.text: bro how did you miss that shot? my grandma plays better than you 🎮

messages.speaker: Taylor
messages.text: ur grandma must be an esports pro then lmaooo

messages.speaker: Sam
messages.text: nah for real tho, you're playing like a potato today 🥔

messages.speaker: Taylor
messages.text: still better than you on your best day, noob 😎

messages.speaker: Riley
messages.text: why don't eggs tell jokes?

messages.speaker: Casey
messages.text: idk, why?

messages.speaker: Riley
messages.text: they'd crack up! 🥚

messages.speaker: Casey
messages.text: omg that was egg-xactly as bad as i expected 🤦‍♂️

messages.speaker: Morgan
messages.text: bruh who puts pineapple on pizza? ur cancelled 🍕

messages.speaker: Quinn
messages.text: don't hate on the sweet n savory combo, you uncultured swine 😤

messages.speaker: Morgan
messages.text: 'uncultured'? says the person committing pizza crimes!

messages.speaker: Quinn
messages.text: whatever pizza police, go eat ur boring pepperoni 😂

messages.speaker: Drew
messages.text: guess who finally got a date? 😎

messages.speaker: Jamie
messages.text: no way! did you hack their phone or something? 📱

messages.speaker: Drew
messages.text: nah fam, pure charm... and maybe a little bit of desperate energy 😅

messages.speaker: Jamie
messages.text: my little disaster is growing up *wipes tear* 😢

messages.speaker: Pat
messages.text: what we watching tonight? pls no more of ur artsy films 🎬

messages.speaker: Charlie
messages.text: excuse me for having taste, you human TikTok compilation 😤

messages.speaker: Pat
messages.text: rather be a TikTok than sit through another 3-hour movie about paint drying

messages.speaker: Charlie
messages.text: fine, we'll watch something with explosions to keep ur goldfish attention span happy 🎯
